author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
This PR updates the pset used in Phase-2 HGCAL HLT. The update follows the pset defined in
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/SimCalorimetry/HGCalSimProducers/python/hgcalDigitizer_cfi.py

This PR also updates the DIGI-HLT step in default D88 workflow, to use `@relval2026` instead of `@fake`.  This should help for Phase-2 HLT validation as mentioned in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/39362.

#### PR validation:
Run test with updated 39434.0.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:
None.
title: Update HGCAL pset for Phase-2 HLT menu
